details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.7.3 Version and conformance level identification - Conformance level.
details.description: A PDF/A-4e conforming file (as described in Annex B) shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as E.

rule.description: A PDF/A-4e conforming file (as described in Annex B) shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as E.

error.message: A PDF/A-4e conforming file does not specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as E.
